Name: Country Tales
About the game: Ted used to be a simple farmer. But he just couldn't see himself being a farmer his whole life. He wanted more. So Ted decided to leave for the big city and finish school there. Once he was done with his education, he found a job in a small town called Sunset Hills. And this is how Ted and Catherine met! Unfortunately for Ted, the mayor himself was Catherine's fianc√©. And the mayor... well, the mayor had some very ambitious plans for Sunset Hills. Or better said, some very ambitious plans for himself.. In this fun and colorful time management game you will explore, guide your people, build, gather resources, overcome obstacles along the way and enjoy the tale of love and family, friendship and courage! HELP Ted & Catherine and friends in their adventures EXPLORE the Wild West in this fun and addictive time management game MEET peculiar character and follow the exciting story Will Ted and Catherine fall IN LOVE? PUT the bad guys where they belong - behind bars! 40 EXCITING levels to master and HUNDREDS of quests 3 DIFFICULTY MODES: relaxed, timed and extreme FIND hidden treasures WIN achievements GORGEOUS high definition visuals and animations Step-by-step tutorials for beginners
